text: Niscaya allahe tomalokaka amanatasamuha tara garaakilai ghuraa'i diyara nirdesa diche. Tomaloke yetiya manuhara majata bicarakarya paraicalana karaiba tetiya tomaloke n'yayaparaayanatara saite bicara karaiba. Allahe tomalokaka yi upadesa diye seya kimana ye utkrsta! Niscaya allaha sarbasraota, sarbadrasta
